description: Parse natural language query into structured contact filters using AI. Accepts ParseFiltersInput with query (required, String, non-empty, max 1000 chars). Returns ParseFiltersResponse with jobTitles (array of String), companyNames (array of String), industry (array of String), location (array of String), employees (array of Int as [min, max] range), seniority (array of String). Example: 'Find CTOs at tech companies in San Francisco' -> {jobTitles: ['CTO'], industry: ['Technology'], location: ['San Francisco']}. Uses LambdaAIClient with Google Gemini AI.
graphql_operation: mutation ParseFilters($input: ParseFiltersInput!) { aiChats { parseFilters(input: $input) { jobTitles companyNames industry location employees seniority } } }
